text: فاخرجنا من كان فيها من المؤمنين

translations.translation: We brought out all the muminun who were there
So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
Then We evacuated there from all the believers
We saved the believers among them,
So We removed the people who had faith, from that town.
So We brought out from therein the believers.
Then We brought forth such as were therein of the believers.
So We brought forth such believers as were in it,
Then we brought forth such believers as were there.
We saved all the faithful in the town.
Thus We brought forth from there in who were believers.
So We picked out those who were in it of the faithful,
Then We evacuated those of the Believers who were there,
So We brought out from therein the believers.
So We brought the believers out of that they were in.
We evacuated all the believers who were in it.
So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
[51:35] So We brought forth those in them, that is, [in] the towns of the people of Lot, who were believers, in order to destroy the disbelievers;
(You We brought forth) from the townships of Lot's folk (such believers as were there) who believed in Allah's divine Oneness.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم لما أردنا رجمهم وإهلاكهم، { فَأَخْرَجْنَا } بإذن ربنا { مَن كَانَ فِيهَا } أي: في تلك القرية { مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ } [الذاريات: 35] المصدقين بنبوة لوط عليه السلام ودينه، الممتثلين بالأوامر والنواهي الجارية على لسانه
